headline: Get To Know
title: About Me
description: As a Senior Software Engineer at ECSFin, I develop innovative banking solutions using Spring Boot, Next.js, React.js, Apache Camel, Kafka, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. With 4+ years of experience, I specialize in building high-quality software and automating processes.Previously, as a Java Developer at Tata Consultancy Services, I created and maintained REST APIs to streamline test data management, improving testing efficiency. Skilled in DevOps, Iâ€™ve configured CI/CD pipelines using Atlassian Bamboo and TFS for seamless software delivery.hold a Bachelor of Computer Application degree from the University of Calicut and have certifications in Groovy, Java, and React.js. Passionate about solving real-world problems, I thrive on challenges and collaboration to deliver impactful solutions.
